alert.note: Alert for Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 11:56PM CDT until July 24 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Delaware County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winthrop Golf Course, or 7 miles west of Manchester, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manchester, Dyersville, Edgewood, Earlville, Colesburg, Greeley, Dundee, Delaware, Masonville, Oneida, Delaware County Fairgrounds, Manchester Airport, Coffins Grove Park, Twin Bridges Park, Petersburg and Backbone State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
